channel.title: 317 runserver errors
channel.description:
Ok, so basically i run server and it says it is online then it says this. fater it says its turned online
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at ShopHandler.loadShops<ShopHandler.java:82> at ShopHandler.<init><ShopHandler.java:33> at server.main<server.java:126>
I'm new so dont say mean stuff just looking for an answer to my problem. thank you. I know this is not a good way of telling the error but it llooks like that if you have any experience in this stuff youll know what im trying to say. Please somebody help me. Also...having another problem with making my server public. I guess the problem is with my No-IP since none of my toher server friends can log on with that IP not even me. Just need help ths al. pl help thanx :P

item.title: 317 runserver errors
item.dc:creator: @ljay_wilson ljay wilson
item.description:
@ljay_wilson wrote:

hmmm
ill try ty.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2009, 02:05:02 am[/size][hr]ok.
Is there a possible way i could find a lot faster lol?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2009, 02:47:55 am[/size][hr]i think i got rid of all spaces checking now k :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2009, 02:50:25 am[/size][hr]ok it didnt work.

item.title: 317 runserver errors
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

You used SPACE instead of TAB somewhere while making one of your shops.
Always use tab.

Read full topic
